name: loggifly
description: LoggiFly is a self-hosted aviation logbook system for pilots and aviators. It allows easy logging of flight time, aircraft, and route information with report generation and customization options.
features: Flight Logging: Track flight time, Aircraft details, Route information. Digital pilot logbook.
Report Generation: Flight reports, Hour summaries, Custom exports. Professional aviation records.
Customization: Custom fields, Personal preferences, Flexible tracking. Adapt to your needs.
Self-Hosted: Privacy-focused, Own your data, Custom deployment. Control your flight records.
Aircraft Management: Fleet tracking, Maintenance logs, Type ratings. Manage your aircraft.
Route Tracking: Departure and arrival, Flight paths, Distance calculation. Complete route records.
Hour Totals: Automatic calculations, Category breakdowns, Currency tracking. Stay current.
Export Options: PDF reports, CSV export, Regulatory formats. Share and backup your logbook.
